entry.title: How to make a bar chart using Vue.js
entry.summary: Often time the project you are working requires us to add a simple bar chart and including a charing library like highcharts.js or charts.js is too costly and resource consuming. In this post lets a make a simple re-usable vue component for a bar chart.

entry.title: Sync data from Firebase to Google sheets
entry.summary: In this blog post I will describe how to sync new data written to a Firebase to Google Sheets. It includes a method for obtaining, storing, and using Oauth2 tokens for Google API access.
